subsection.name: Description
subsection.div: Ensures that lambda parameters that are not used are declared as an unnamed variable.

ul.li: Improves code readability by clearly indicating which parameters are unused.
Follows Java conventions for denoting unused parameters with an underscore (_).

subsection.p: See the Java Language Specification for more information about unnamed variables.

Attention: Unnamed variables are available as a preview feature in Java 21, and became an official part of the language in Java 22. This check should be activated only on source code which meets those requirements.

subsection.name: Violation Messages
subsection.p: All messages can be customized if the default message doesn't suit you. Please see the documentation to learn how to.
